name: Solitaire Collection (itch)
description:
Solitaire Collection is a collection of most popular classic solitaire card games. It contains Klondike (draw by one and three), Spider (one, two and three suits), Freecell, Pyramid, and Tri-Peaks Solitaire.

This is a free version and suitable for all age groups. 

Simple UI with highly intuitive play options. Games can be played using traditional drag and drop style of play. Another way of playing games is by simple tap and choose. Tap any card to see all possible moves and click on a desired move to play. Tap and choose is highly optimized for play on mobile devices. 

Features
- 5 classic games - Klondike (draw by one and three), Spider (one, two and three suits), Freecell, Pyramid, and Tri-Peaks Solitaire
- Save game state to play later
- Tap and select or drag and drop style of play
- Unlimited undo
- Game play statistics
- Auto complete option to finish solved games
- Sound on/off options
